author: Arvin Ash
description:
Full video: https://youtu.be/A159CqlSdtQ "Hidden Rules of the Universe that Control Everything!"

Dive into the world of **quantum physics** to understand how **particles** behave differently at the quantum level. This video simplifies **quantum mechanics** and **quantum entanglement**, explaining **decoherence theory** and the role of **environment interaction**. Explore the nuances of **quantum theory** and its impact on our understanding of reality.
title: Quantum Physics: Why Particles Act Like Points: Mind Blowing!
